definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Will you please put one dollar and seventy-five cents in the coin slot?
sentences.chinese: 請先將一塊七毛五投入投幣口，好嗎？

sentences.english: Deposit a dime in the slot and the door will open.
sentences.chinese: 在投幣口投一角錢硬幣，門就會自動開。

sentences.english: Please put a coin into the slot.
